statements: DELETE FROM financial_transactions WHERE card_number like '1234%';
DELETE FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND is_fraud = TRUE;
DELETE FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND merchant_name = 'Amazon';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 AND fraud_flag = TRUE;
DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraud = TRUE;
DELETE FROM fraud_records WHERE fraud_category = 'Credit Card Fraud';
DELETE FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0 AND account_type = 'Savings';
